div.p: This value set does not contain a fixed number of concepts
Includes any data element granularity that supports comparison of the data elements - possibly after automated normalization.
This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/dataelement-granularity where concept is-a comparable

publisher.value: Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT

description.value: Includes any data element granularity that supports comparison of the data elements - possibly after automated normalization.
